description: From the cold, icy streets of your favorite mountain town to the chilly nights in camp along the river, the Nevadan™ Down Parka is Mountain Hardwear's go-to, everyday cold-weather puffy that might as well be standard issue for anyone interested in the outdoors. The jacket's durable ripstop shell and 650-fill down dispatch with any sub-comfy temps, and they even added a pair of beverage-sized drop pockets to keep your extras at the ready.
name: Mountain Hardwear Nevadan Down Parka - Mens
